name: PixelJunk Racers 2nd Lap
description:
PixelJunk™ Racers 2nd Lap is an addictive slot car racing game that supports 1080p* and features single player and multiplayer fun (up to 7 players simultaneously offline!). Intuitive controls, 32 different race modes, and online rankings will provide countless hours of racing mayhem.

Enhancements of the PixelJunk™ Racers 2nd Lap includes:

- Trophy support: What's a race car driver without the podium trophy? Replay PixelJunk™ Racers 2nd Lap to unlock all the added Trophies

- Ghost Attack: Think you're the best? Register your new record on the high score tables and allow anyone in the world (including your friends of course) can compete against your best race

See you on the race track!

NOTE: PixelJunk™ Racers 2nd Lap is totally FREE for existing owners of PixelJunk™ Racers
